# Publicly Available Specification - Equity Lens Infrastructure
=====================================

**Reference Number:** cb-8818-19367556
**Solicitation Number:** 2023-16
**Publication Date:** September 7, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** October 10, 2023, 4:00 p.m. EST
**Expected Contract Start Date:** October 23, 2023
**Expected Contract End Date:** October 22, 2024
**Tender Status:** Expired

## Background

The Standards Council of Canada (SCC) invites Suppliers to submit their proposals to develop a Publicly Available Specification (PAS) for applying an equity lens to disaster and climate-resilient infrastructure project design and portfolio management. This specification aims to provide guidance for asset owners and municipalities to inform their decision-making and risk management regarding their infrastructure, prioritizing construction, operation, and retrofit in the context of climate change adaptation.

## Objective

The ultimate goal of this PAS is to provide a framework for identifying and addressing the needs of groups disproportionately affected by climate change and natural disasters, thereby reducing risks associated with these events.

## Mandatory Requirements

* Proposal submission deadline: October 10, 2023, 4:00 p.m. EST
* Form of tender: Request for Proposal (RFP) on now website
* Documentation requirements: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8818/scc_rfp_2023-16-pas-equity-lens-infrastructure_v1_2023-09-07_en.pdf (English), https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8818/ccn-dp_2023-16-pas-notions-equite-infrastructure_v1_2023-09-07_fr_1.pdf (French)

## Tender Requirements Evaluation Criteria

The proposal evaluation criteria will focus on a combination of technical merit and price to select the Supplier best suited to fulfill the PASS requirements.

## Proposal Submission Instructions

Tenders must be submitted via the Request for Proposal on the now website, and must include the Proposal Submission Form, Proposal Template, and all supporting documentation as outlined in the tender documentation.
